map.name: default
map.item:
In this experiment, you will see a series of two different stimuli presented one at a time. Your task is to determine which stimulus was presented, and press the appropriate button as quickly as possible.
If you see [STIM_ONE_DESCRIPTION], press the left mouse button as quickly as possible.
If you see [STIM_TWO_DESCRIPTION], press the right mouse button as quickly as possible.
Try not to anticipate which stimulus will appear, or when it will appear. Simply respond as quickly as possible when you see a stimulus. Remember, press the left mouse button if you see [STIM_ONE_DESCRIPTION]. Press the right mouse button if you see [STIM_TWO_DESCRIPTION].
Press either mouse button when you are ready to begin.

map.name: Sound
map.item:
In this experiment, you will hear a series of two sounds presented one at a time. Your task is to determine which of two possible sounds was presented, and press the appropriate button as quickly as possible.
If you hear [STIM_ONE_DESCRIPTION], press the left mouse button as quickly as possible.
If you hear [STIM_TWO_DESCRIPTION], press the right mouse button as quickly as possible.
Try not to anticipate which sound you will hear, or when it will occur. Simply respond as quickly as possible when you hear a sound. Remember, press the left mouse button if you hear [STIM_ONE_DESCRIPTION]. Press the right mouse button if you hear [STIM_TWO_DESCRIPTION].
Press either mouse button when you are ready to begin.
